verses.name: Ezekiel 13:1
verses.text: And the word of the Lord came unto me, saying,

verses.name: Ezekiel 13:2
verses.text: Son of man, prophesy against the prophets of Israel that prophesy, and say thou unto them that prophesy out of their own hearts, Hear ye the word of the Lord;

verses.name: Ezekiel 13:3
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord God; Woe unto the foolish prophets, that follow their own spirit, and have seen nothing!

verses.name: Ezekiel 13:4
verses.text: O Israel, thy prophets are like the foxes in the deserts.

verses.name: Ezekiel 13:5
verses.text: Ye have not gone up into the gaps, neither made up the hedge for the house of Israel to stand in the battle in the day of the Lord.
